product_name: Pearl Izumi EM Trail M2 Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: Engineered to provide a smooth, stable trail-running experience, the Pearl Izumi EM Trail M2 Trail-Running shoes offer your feet a minimalist fit and feel for comfort and performance.
